vulnerabilities.title: nginx HTTP/2 Memory Corruption
vulnerabilities.description: A memory corruption vulnerability in nginx HTTP/2 implementation allows remote code execution.
vulnerabilities.solution: Update nginx to version 1.25.4 or later

vulnerabilities.title: MySQL Privilege Escalation
vulnerabilities.description: Authenticated users can escalate privileges through crafted SQL queries.
vulnerabilities.solution: Update MySQL to version 8.0.35 or later

vulnerabilities.title: Windows RDP Remote Code Execution
vulnerabilities.description: Remote code execution vulnerability in Windows RDP allows unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code.

vulnerabilities.title: SQL Server Authentication Bypass
vulnerabilities.description: Authentication bypass in SQL Server allows remote attackers to access databases without credentials.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply SQL Server CU18 or later

vulnerabilities.title: RDP Exposed to Network
vulnerabilities.description: RDP service is exposed to the internal network without NLA enabled.
vulnerabilities.solution: Enable Network Level Authentication and restrict RDP access via firewall

vulnerabilities.title: EternalBlue SMB Remote Code Execution
vulnerabilities.description: The SMBv1 server in Microsoft Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted packets (EternalBlue).
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply MS17-010 security update and disable SMBv1

vulnerabilities.title: SMBv1 Enabled
vulnerabilities.description: SMBv1 protocol is enabled, which has known security vulnerabilities.
vulnerabilities.solution: Disable SMBv1 protocol via PowerShell: Disable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName SMB1Protocol

vulnerabilities.title: Outdated Operating System
vulnerabilities.description: Windows Server 2016 is approaching end of mainstream support.

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Windows Updates
vulnerabilities.description: System is missing 15 security updates from the last 90 days.
vulnerabilities.solution: Apply all pending Windows security updates
